Related Pages
Here is a list of all related documentation pages:
 DownloadSource and some binaries are on github :
 <h1>G4/vis plotting</h1>In Geant4/11.x, the G4/vis system is equipped to be able to do plotting, then to have a representation (a plot) of 1D or 2D histograms within a G4/vis viewer
 <h1>G4/vis ToolsSG drivers</h1>The visualization system of Geant4 11.x comes with the ToolsSG drivers
 <h1>g4tools</h1>G4tools is a "namespace protected" part of the inlib and exlib libraries which is of some interest for Geant4, mainly the histograms, the ntuples and the code to write them at the CERN-ROOT, AIDA XML, csv and now HDF5 file formats
 <h1>Usage</h1>G4tools comes with test programs of its own that may be usefull in case of problems (for example porting on a not yet covered platform)
 <h1>User API</h1>We describe here some of the public methods potentially seen by a user doing analysis
